This document is a working file to keep a list of references to papers relevant for the tidystats project.

## List of references

- http://statcheck.io: A tool to extract statistics from papers for errors in statistical reporting
- https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/broom/vignettes/broom.html: An R package to turn output of statistical models into tidy data frames
- https://ropensci.org/blog/blog/2017/04/18/tabulizer: An R package to help extract tabular data from their PDF prisons
